subject: Junitee
msgSnippet: Hello Everyone: I have been wondering if anyone can give me a hint on the following error I get. I am trying to Enter the URL to the JUnitEE servlet in my
messageBody:
Hello Everyone:
I have been wondering if anyone can give me a hint on the following
error I get. I am trying to Enter the URL to the JUnitEE servlet in
my browser and I get the followoing error:

[Servlet Error]-[JUnitEEServlet]: java.lang.NullPointerException

(JUnitEEServlet.java:284)

(JUnitEEServlet.java:265)

(JUnitEEServlet.java:177)

(HttpServlet.java:853)

patch(WebAppRequestDispatcher.java:974)

com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.srt.WebAppInvoker.handleInvocationHook

your replies are appreciated in advance greatly,
